name: GENUINE Chrysoprase nuggets sterling silver bracelet
description:
You are looking at a natural APPLE GREEN COLOR Chrysoprase nuggets and sterling silver bracelet. This is NOT mint green, or a washed out shade of green, but a vivid apple green!

The gemstones measure from

approx 10 (0.40 inches) till 15 (0.60 inches) mm in length and from 7 till 9mm in width.

Thickness of the nuggets= approx 5 mm


The nuggets are flanked by wavy brushed sterling silver shiny disks and 4 mm seamless round sterling silver beads.


It closes with a handmade S clasp and I have tumbled the bracelet to shine.

It measures 8.5 inches (19 cm) in length (including the clasp and the extender) and it fits a wrist from 6 in to 7 inches, but I can resize the bracelet at no additional cost.

Dont miss out this one-of-a-kind piece!

The nuggets have been strung on 49- strand Beadalon professional stringing wire for maximum flexibility and durability.

 

All my jewelry is handcrafted by me in my home studio, in The Netherlands and it is new, unworn. I work only with top quality materials (sterling silver and gemstones that I purchase from long established companies). I will ship my items properly sanitized and securely packaged. I ship right after receiving cleared payment, via priority mail.  My jewelry should arrive to you within 5 to 7 business days from the day of shipment. I want you to be 100% happy with your purchase, so I accept returns within 2 weeks and you will be refunded. I am commited to quality and to a great customer service, so please don't hesitate to contact me, so I can meet your needs!

Of course, I appreciate your positive feedback:)

Thank you so much for looking

name: Designer Lampwork & Quartz Sterling Silver Necklace
description:
FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!

You are looking at a beautiful handmade sterling silver necklace featuring unique lampwork beads (14 mm width  x 9 mm thick), sparkling faceted rock crystal quartz rondelles (6 mm x 4 mm) and seamless 925 silver beads (4 mm).

Total necklace length = 24.5 inches (62 cm) and it can be worn at a shorter length.

I handsawn the sterling silver rings and I intermingled round wire rings with twisted wire rings in order to add texture to the chain. I soldered the twisted wire rings.

An elegant necklace, one of a kind,  to be treasured and loved!

It closes with a handmade Sclasp.


Please visit my EBAY STORE for other original silver & gemstones jewelry pieces

***

All my jewelry is handcrafted by me in my home studio, in The Netherlands and it is new, unworn. I work only with top quality materials (sterling silver and gemstones that I purchase from long established companies). I will ship my items properly sanitized and securely packaged. I ship right after receiving cleared payment ,via PRIORITY MAIL.

Free shipping on this item!

My jewelry should arrive to you within 5 to 7 business days from the day of shipment. I want you to be 100% happy with your purchase, so I accept returns within 2 weeks and you will be refunded.

Of course, I appreciate your positive feedback:)

Thank you so much for looking!

name: HANDMADE SLEEPING BEAUTY TURQUOISE 925 Silver Necklace
description:
This delicate sterling silver necklace  is approx 16.5 inches (approx 42 cm) long and features 3 natural, untreated SLEEPING BEAUTY TURQUOISE nuggets from the mine of Globe, in Arizona. The nuggets are flanked by Bali style sterling silver beads and spacers. The necklace continues with a delicate, sterling silver chain with fancy links that has 4 round natural, untreated SLEEPING BEAUTY TURQUOISE round beads, also from the mine of Globe, in Arizona. These round beads are flanked each by 2 brushed sterling silver wavy disks.

This beautiful, one of a kind necklace closes with a Bali style sterling silver toggle and I would be happy to resize it for you at no extra charges.

The turquoise round beads measure approx 5.5 mm and the nuggets approx 15 x 7mm.
All my jewelry is handcrafted by me in my home studio, in The Netherlands and it is new, unworn. I work only with top quality materials (sterling silver and gemstones that I purchase from long established companies). I will ship my items properly sanitized and securely packaged. I ship right after receiving cleared payment ,via PRIORITY MAIL.

FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!

 My jewelry should arrive to you within 5 to 7 business days from the day of shipment. I want you to be 100% happy with your purchase, so I accept returns within 2 weeks and you will be refunded.

Of course, I appreciate your positive feedback:)

Thank you so much for looking!

name: SOFT BLUE PERUVIAN OPAL/AMAZONITE 925 SILVER NECKLACE
description:
You are looking at a beautiful sterling silver necklace featuring teardrop handcut blue peruvian opals, top quality  amazonite smooth rondelles and Bali style sterling spacers.

Delicate milky sky-blue opals and amazonite natural gems, seafoam blues in the softest hues make a statement in this necklace!

All sterling silver links are handmade, the rondelles have been wire wrapped and the necklace closes with a Bali style toggle.

Currently the necklace measures 20 inches (51 cm)

The opal dangles measure 1.5 inches (approx 3,5 cm) so please keep this in mind when you consider the total length of the necklace.

The handmade S-links measure approx 1 inch (2,5cm). The Amazonite rondelles measure approx 5 mm.

It has been tumbled  and looks very feminine to say the least!

I can oxidize it at your request, at no charge.

***

All my jewelry is handcrafted by me in my home studio, in The Netherlands and it is new, unworn. I work only with top quality materials (sterling silver and gemstones that I purchase from long established companies). I will ship my items properly sanitized and securely packaged. I ship right after receiving cleared payment ,via PRIORITY MAIL.

 My jewelry should arrive to you within 5 to 7 business days from the day of shipment. I want you to be 100% happy with your purchase, so I accept returns within 2 weeks and you will be refunded.



Thank you so much for looking!
